item.title: EMA SMA Cross Algorithm & Backtest
item.description: I decided to try making a simple algorithm trader in R. The algorithm is a play on the “moving average crossover” strategy. Traditionally, this strategy involves taking two simply moving averages (SMAs) – one that averages over a longer time window, and one that averages over a shorter time window – and buy/sell based on when the two SMAs crossover. However, I decided to use an exponential moving average (EMA) and an SMA over the same time window.
